title: GOFLAME Large 0.9Cu.ft Countertop Microwave Oven, 900-Watt Retro Microwave w/Child Safety Lock, Defrost & Auto Cooking Function, LED Display, Glass Turntable, White
description: Are you looking for a magic to make the delicious food? This is our practical microwave oven that will give you leisure cooking time. This microwave oven offers so simple operation with 2 knobs and 2 buttons that the elders can operate it easily. It comes with 5 power levels to help you prepare a variety of food. And the rotating glass turntable contributes to even heating and cooking. What’s more, with the 0.9 Cu. Ft capacity and compact size, you are allowed to cook food for your family or friends in apartments, offices and so on. The user-friendly design and ETL certification ensure comfortable and safe using experience. This retro microwave oven will meet your cooking needs and be your great helper and partner in the kitchen.

5 power levels make this microwave oven satisfy with your various cooking needsRotation of glass turntable is beneficial to cooking or heating food more evenly Providing simple operation for elders with power selector and time knobIdeal for small apartments, dormitories, offices with compact size and retro style0.9 Cu.Ft interior capacity offers ample space for food cooking in daily lifeClear viewing window allows you to observe the cooking status all the timeA bell ring will be heard in order to remind you when the cooking has finished The whole machine has ETL certification and the power line has UL certificationChild lock design to lock control panel for protecting your childrenLED display to show the remaining cooking time clearly
Package includes:1 × Microwave Oven, 1 × User Manual
